name: The Rail
description:
The Rail is an endless runner game, where the player grinds along a rail and can rotate around it 360 degrees. Rail features:
-Procedurally generated
-Randomized coin placement
-Increased challenge over time

In addition to earning points by collecting coins, you are also rewarded for combo chains, or collecting consecutive coins.

Controls:
-Tap right to rotate right
-Tap left to rotate left
-Tap both sides to jump
